pageContent: Background: Stereotactic body radiotherapy (SBRT) has emerged as an effective treatment for localized prostate cancer. However, prostate specific antigen (PSA) kinetics after prostate SBRT have not been well characterized. The purpose of this study was to analyze the trend in PSA decline following robotic SBRT from a prospective cohort of patients.

metaData.source:
Long-term treatment results of elderly patients with prostate cancer in Japan: an analysis of prognostic factors
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/10225698/
